channel.title: I need help making my server only work if you use my client
channel.description: Hey everybody, i need some help, how can i make it so people "have" to use my client to play my server, i think it has something to do with server.java but i dont know, if anyone has a link to a tut or can teach me how right here on this thread, plz, help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2008, 04:11:27 PM[/size][hr]cmon smart people i need ur help
